pr_title: Move FIS precondition format check to installation constructor

timeline.message: Move FIS precondition format check to installation constructor

timeline.bodyText:
Did you remove these methods?
getApplicationId, getProjectIdentifier, getApiKey
Also, for getProjectIdentifier we wanted to either use project id or sender id.
timeline.author: ankitaj224

replies.bodyText:
No, I didn't remove those methods. I just made preConditionChecks to be static and move it to constructor from getId() and getToken().


getProjectIdentifier was changed to take only projectId on last PR as requested by Rayo.
replies.author: ChaoqunCHEN

replies.bodyText: nit: If those methods arent used remove them.
replies.author: ankitaj224

replies.bodyText: Thanks, those methods are used somewhere else. So I keep them.
replies.author: ChaoqunCHEN
